scenes.background: (Monica) looks at her phone, seemingly annoyed. (Bob) taps his foot impatiently.
scenes.description: ‘We’ve prioritized the tasks, but we still need your input. What do you suggest?’

options.text: Let's schedule a quick call to discuss the most critical points.
options.analysis: You offered a collaborative approach to manage the situation, showing good perception and empathy, though your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I appreciate the effort, but I really need to stick to my leave. Is there another way?
options.analysis: You acknowledged their efforts but stood firm on your need for leave, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation.

options.text: I think you should manage this internally. It’s part of your responsibilities.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, which might strain team relationships.
